module.name: System Admin
module.description: System Administration - Gives you access to various system administration tools. This module is designed to work only with the officail FreePBX Distro.
module.changelog: *2.9.0.18/19* #872 *2.9.0.17* #891 *2.9.0.16* Add Sydney Australia to Timezones *2.9.0.15* #885 *2.9.0.12* #854 *2.9.0.10-12* #753 *2.9.0.8* Fixes storage issues with cli script *2.9.0.7* Fix issue with UPS Management for Sysadmin Pro *2.9.0.5/6* Fix for LoadLicense *2.9.0.3* #760, #761 *2.9.0.2* Fixed lots of items *2.9.0.1* Add more info in Desc. *2.9.0.0* Fix lots of little issues and bump to 2.9. *2.8.0.38* #648 *2.8.0.36* #634 *2.8.0.33-35* #634 *2.8.0.32* #631 *2.8.0.31* fixes spelling error in require *2.8.0.28-30* move more functions to their own 'controller' *2.8.0.27* #619 *2.5.0.26* Emailsetup migration *2.8.0.25* Give OSS access to intrusion detection *2.8.0.24* Fix for use with OSS *2.8.0.23* Fix storage to work with pbxtended *2.8.0.22* Add notification email hook *2.8.0.20* License Changes *2.8.0.13* First release
